comment.author: 69005233@N00
comment._content: Mrs J.P. Mitchel is most likely the wife of John Purroy Mitchel, who was mayor of NYC. He was known as "the Boy Mayor". en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_Purroy_Mitchel

comment.author: 69005233@N00
comment._content: Mrs. R. Adamson (Ethel) is wife of Robert Adamson, Fire Commissioner of NY. Another photo of her is here: memory.loc.gov/cgi-bin/query/h?ammem/mnwp:@field(NUMBER+@band(mnwp+147003))

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: Thank you Brenda Anderson and Wystan for the details about these women and the review of firemen. We will add more details when we update.
